gold.user: Project Manager seeking to retrieve all existing plans for review.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all plans with their details.

gold.user: Team Lead creating a new plan for the upcoming sprint.
gold.ideal: Creates a new plan and returns the created plan's details.

gold.user: Developer looking to view details of a specific plan.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified plan.

gold.user: Scrum Master updating the plan to reflect new deadlines.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified plan and returns the updated plan's details.

gold.user: Project Manager archiving a completed plan.
gold.ideal: Archives the specified plan and confirms the action.

gold.user: Team Lead duplicating a plan to create a similar one for another project.
gold.ideal: Duplicates the specified plan and returns the new plan's details.

gold.user: Developer removing an outdated plan from the active list.
gold.ideal: Moves the specified plan to the trash and confirms the action.
